Review Text:
I’ve stayed in this hotel many times and it’s always a pleasure to return. Well located near the access to the ski lifts.
Friendly staff and nice atmosphere. Quality and variety of food should be improved. Breakfast service should also be improved

Review Title: Very good experience with things to improve.
Review Text:
We were here last week and I'm really happy.
The reception staff, bar/cafeteria, dining room...all very attentive and nice.
The food also very well, we had a great breakfast.
The rooms are "right", have some things to improve: (we were in a quadruple or junior suite)
- We touched the sixth floor and although I did not dislike the fact of estra so far up I could not enjoy it because our windows were lofty and we saw nothing but the sky and little else.
-the bathroom window, which was the one that if overlooked the river, was "occupied" by pigeons. 
There is very little light in general, both in the room and in the bathroom. Inside the shower there is not a spotlight and the truth is that showering in the dark is not very pleasant.
The first day I found the room quite clean, but the next few days are not that they tried very hard to make the rooms...at least sweep and scrub.
They could put some more paperwork in the room.
- They could also put some furniture for clothes because being rooms for so many people lacks space to unpack.

The room was very spacious and comfortable.

The hotel very well located, with ski storage, game rooms, rooms for children, etc.

They could improve/modernize four things but it is certainly a hotel I would recommend.

Review Title: Great place for a ski week
Review Text: Very comfortable facilities, the location is very good, in the middle of the main Street with restaurants and bars nearby and  at walking distance from lift (350 mts flat), good breakfast, and very kind front desk personnel. Very good price to quality ratio.

spotless cleanliness

Additional Ratings:
Value:5

Location:5
Cleanliness:5
Service:5
Sleep Quality:5
Review Text:
We have been coming to the Ski Plaza Hotel for seven years as a family, and on each occasion we are pleased to confirm that we have made the right choice.
The location is the best in Canillo, in the heart of town with everything very close (Palau de Gel in front, many restaurants and shops) and the cable car only 200 meters. The hotel facilities are fantastic, very comfortable and all super clean.
But definitely the best is the staff, all very polite, very friendly, always smiling, in good spirits and willing to help. This is really the main feature of why we choose to return to the Ski Plaza every year. All the staff are wonderful, starting with their director Nati, and following by their reception team (Candelaria, Juan, Gonzalo, Camila, Emilie), the bar (Gonzalo), the restaurant (Matías, Mili), the Spa (Agustina, fantastic massage therapist), and also the cleaning assistants. We are forgetting some names, but they are no less important in the day to day functioning of the place. We had a great time. Thank you very much to everyone and until next year.

Sleep Quality:2
Review Text:
The hotel is well equipped. The service very friendly and attentive, clean very well. Only for us there are a couple of things that subtract points: the unbearable heat in the room even with the radiators off, we had k open windows to sleep. And the second the beds. That suits me, but they are very soft and we sank into them. 
We were also unlucky that neither darts nor pool worked.. 
In short, a good hotel but give our point of view not a 4 stars.

Review Title: Showers and dressing room for last day of skiing
Review Text: First indicate that both the service, facilities and food are to a satisfactory standard. On the other hand, tell them that the cost of the stay in recent years has increased markedly, but skiers who take advantage of the last day to ski find themselves begging for changing rooms to shower and change. I think the least that could be offered is this service, free or at a symbolic cost. I am sure that thousands of guests would appreciate this and it would also be a reason to choose your hotel and not another, it should be a mandatory option. Also tell them that the pool room is not working, nor the dart machine, this is somewhat abandoned.

Review Text: One side of the curtains in a bedroom was not working, so we stayed partly in darkness. The view from the window is not good at all. If come on breakfast at 10.00 you won’t see everything that should be there (they stop serving/renew the food before 10am).

Review Text:
We were at the hotel in early January 2025. We took a family room ‘cause we were with 2 kids. We really liked the hotel: it’s very nice with extraordinary responsive staff. There is a real fireplace in the lobby, the breakfast is quite varied, the rooms are cozy and warm.
Very convenient location - nearby parking, a ski lift, a real big ice rink and a lot of shops.

Review Title: Good choice, do not relax please
Review Text: Breakfast buffet varied, cafeteria bar with possibility to order a rich burger if you want to eat early, closeness cable car, ski storage with warm boots, comfortable room....Yes, there was a day that leaving it free at 09h, at 15h had not passed the room service.

Review Title: Poor cleanliness room. The rest is fine.
Review Text: The cleanliness of the nefarious room. Despite having notified reception and forwarded the complaint via email, the room was not cleaned well any day. Lint and hair bags everywhere. The photos were shown at reception and attached to the complaint via email.
